p1: This test project allows to save a list of workers, and additional informations, like start salary, current salary, and salary on fixed time. Business logic in ideal case should be written in separate class, but I did not do in this way. Bussiness logic implemented, the directly, in inherited classes(Employee, Manager, Sales). And it is so bad. In real project I prefer to separate business logic, connect a database, correct the architecture and we can get scalable and profitable project.
